summary: The document is a communication concerning the release of records under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992, dated 25 August 1976. It references a specific communication (Maami TWX 13477) and includes handling instructions that designate it for background use only, prohibiting its reproduction.
key_findings: The document pertains to the assassination of President John F. Kennedy and is governed by the Assassination Records Act of 1992.
It specifically mentions Maami TWX 13477, indicating a particular communication within the records.
Handling instructions highlight the document's sensitive nature, restricting it to background use and forbidding reproduction.
